title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. D - Canal System
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. D - Canal System

State Regulations

Part 150 - General Provisions (§ 150.1 to 150.13)

Part 151 - Navigational Rules (§ 151.1 to 151.44)

Part 152 - Rules For Pleasure Boats (§ 152.1 to 152.23)

Part 153 - Terminal Use (§ 153.1 to 153.11)

Part 154 - Fees And Charges For Salvage Work And For Use Of Dry Docks (§ 154.1 to 154.3 to 154.12)

Part 155 - Dimension Requirements And Mileage Data (§ 155.1 to 155.7 to 155.10)

Part 156 - Revocable Permits (§ 156.1 to 156.4)

Part 157 - Public Access To Canal Corporation Records (§ 157.1 to 157.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. III, subch. D
The powers and duties of the NYS Canal System were
transferred from the NYS Department of Transportation to the NYS Thruway

Authority pursuant to chapter 766 of the Laws of
1992. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
